title: Power - average power delivered to cart

content.question: At time <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, a cart with mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> being pushed on a straight, level track has speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math>. A short time later at <math alttext="t sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, the cart has speed <math alttext="3 v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mi>v</mi></math>. Which of the following expressions is equal to the average power delivered to the cart between time <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="t sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="4 m times v squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>
<math alttext="nine halves m times v squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 4 m times v squared, and denominator t sub 2, end sub, minus t sub 1, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 9 m times v squared, and denominator 2 times, open parenthesis, t sub 2, end sub, minus t sub 1, close parenthesis, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 4 m times v squared, and denominator t sub 2, end sub, minus t sub 1, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
